DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immune response safety live attenuate influenza H5 vaccine candidate strain A/17/turkey/Turkey/05/133 ( H5N2 ) manufacture GPO , Thailand healthy Thais .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Live Attenuated Influenza H5N2
DOC.detailed_description: It double blind randomize study use 7.5-8.5 log EID50 dose dose test phase I . 150 participant ( 100 vaccinee 50 placebo ) age 18-49 year old enrol . All separate 4 batch ; Batch 1 : 36 participant ( 24 vaccinee 12 placebo ) Batch 2 : 38 participant ( 25 vaccinee 13 placebo ) Batch 3 : 38 participant ( 25 vaccinee 13 placebo ) Batch 4 : 38 participant ( 26 vaccinee 12 placebo ) Each batch admit isolation ward 5 day immunization mainly safety assessment . Two dos live attenuate influenza H5 vaccine candidate strain A/17/turkey/Turkey/05/133 ( H5N2 ) give intranasal route 28 day apart . Total follow 60 day .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Age 1849 year old Having Thai ID card equivalent Are seronegative specific H5 influenza virus determine antibody titer le 1:40 HAI test correspond antigen . Anti HIV Negative All hematology , biochemistry urine analysis within normal range clinical significance ( 1.5 time normal value ) Able read write sign write informed consent . Known history egg allergy Having recently influenza infection confirm H5 History bronchial asthma History chronic lung diseases History chronic rhinitis History immunodeficiency state History immunosuppression History heavy smoking ( 5 roll per day ) History alcoholic ( pure drink 200 ml per day ) Acute infectious noninfectious disease ( within 2 week ) Exacerbation chronic disease cancer HIV positives Anamnestic leukocytosis , hepatitis B C positives The volunteer take immunoglobulin product blood transfusion past three month begin experiment Participation research study stop participant le 1 month Pregnancy plan become pregnant 60 day enrollment breast feed Any concomitant medication Aspirin Poultry worker
